commonLink.correctAnswer: Originally marketed or sold as health tonics in pharmacies

commonLink.hint: Only the Burj Khalifa is over 2000 ft.

commonLink.trapAnswer: Places where polar bears live natively

items: 'It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen.'
